abstract: When the Walt Disney Company bought its rival, Pixar, in 2006 for $7.4 billion, many people assumed the deal would play out like most big media takeovers: abysmally.
lead_paragraph: When the Walt Disney Company bought its rival, Pixar, in 2006 for $7.4 billion, many people assumed the deal would play out like most big media takeovers: abysmally.

headline.main: Disney and Pixar: The Power of the Prenup
